articles.author: Sian Cain
articles.title: Adidas shareholders launch class action lawsuit over Kanye West brand Yeezy - The Guardian
articles.description: Investors claim sportswear giant failed to minimise their exposure to risk after the rapper and designer’s antisemitic comments led to a sharp decline in the share price
articles.content: Adidas shareholders have filed a class action lawsuit against the sportswear brand, claiming it knew about Kanye Wests problematic behaviour years before it ended their partnership over his antisemit… [+3398 chars]
